question: Jin Liqun has been re-appointed as the President of which international institution?
explanation:
Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) elected Jin Liqun for a second term as President, during the annual meeting.
His second five-year term will begin from January 2021. The board of governors of AIIB also approved the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to host the 2021 AIIB Annual Meeting, from October 27-28, 2021, in Dubai.
